name: Vendr.com
headline: Vendr is the place to buy and sell software.
description: Vendr helps software buyers pay less for software and helps software sellers acquire customers at a lower CAC -- a no brainer for both buyers and sellers. $4 billion+ of software transacted on Vendr, across 2,500+ software sellers.
markdown:
raw_markdown="[The 2025 SaaS Trends Report:Uncover the top purchases, pricing trends, and AI's impact ](http://www.vendr.com/</insights/saas-trends-report-2025>)

Trusted by 12,000+ software buyers, saving over:
$400,000,000
Empowering every department to buy any software with fair pricing, fast and easy. Choose from 20,000+ products.

![Vendr Price Check - See how your pricing compares to other software buyers](http://www.vendr.com/assets/homePagePurchase1-DIp9GU2T.png)
# Already have a quote? We'll check the price in under 2 minutes.
Upload your existing quote for a free Price Check in under 2 minutes. See how your pricing compares and get money-saving tips — fast, easy, and free.
# Don't have a quote yet? We've already negotiated for you.
Access exclusive savings from 100+ seller partners with a low-price guarantee. Skip the back-and-forth — get a great deal instantly.
![Vendr is processing a software price quote for exclusive savings and low-price guarantee](http://www.vendr.com/assets/homePagePurchase2-C8XKtJIJ.png)
![Use Vendr's pricing data to get the lowest possible price on any software product](http://www.vendr.com/assets/homePagePurchase3-BOL4sb5M.png)
# The no-brainer way to buy software for every business and every department.
Leverage Vendr's pricing data, negotiation insights, and partner network to get lower prices on any software product -- fair, fast, and easy.
![Vendr customer testimonial - Davison Paull, General Counsel at Dashlane](http://www.vendr.com/assets/homePageTestimonial-C1iwHG7h.png)
![Dashlane logo](http://www.vendr.com/assets/dashlaneLogoWhite-BwFNCdXO.png)Vendr ensures I get the best value at the right price when purchasing SaaS.- Davison Paull, General Counsel.
## How Vendr Works
### 
1
### Tell Vendr about your purchase
Provide purchase details and a quote if you have one
![How Vendr Works - Step 1](http://www.vendr.com/assets/HomeHowVendrWorks1-CVHUog8u.png)
### 
2
### See what similar companies pay
Vendr will tell you the fair price range, or if you already have a price we will validate if it's low or not
### 
3
### Buy now, save thousands
Vendr makes money through a small transaction fee, paid by seller partners

# Already have a quote? We'll check the price in under 2 minutes.
Upload your existing quote for a free Price Check in under 2 minutes. See how your pricing compares and get money-saving tips — fast, easy, and free.
# Don't have a quote yet? We've already negotiated for you.
Access exclusive savings from 100+ seller partners with a low-price guarantee. Skip the back-and-forth — get a great deal instantly.

# The no-brainer way to buy software for every business and every department.
Leverage Vendr's pricing data, negotiation insights, and partner network to get lower prices on any software product -- fair, fast, and easy.

### 
1
### Tell Vendr about your purchase
Provide purchase details and a quote if you have one
![How Vendr Works - Step 1⟨124⟩]
### 
2
### See what similar companies pay
Vendr will tell you the fair price range, or if you already have a price we will validate if it's low or not
### 
3
### Buy now, save thousands
Vendr makes money through a small transaction fee, paid by seller partners

generated_description:
Vendr.com is an innovative marketplace designed to streamline the buying and selling of software. Launched in 2019 and hailing from Boston, Vendr has since established itself as a major player in the SaaS procurement landscape. It originally set out to help software buyers negotiate better prices and assist sellers in lowering their Customer Acquisition Costs (CAC). With over $4 billion in software transactions across 2,500+ sellers, it’s proving to be a win-win for all involved.

As a part of Y Combinator Batch S19, Vendr has grown rapidly, employing a dedicated team of 338 people. Its mission is straightforward: make software acquisition easier and more cost-effective for everyone. By tapping into their network and data insights, Vendr helps businesses access fair pricing on over 20,000 products and has saved its users over $400 million to date.

When it comes to buyers, Vendr offers a fair price check—if you have a quote, you can upload it for a quick comparison to ensure you're getting a good deal. If you're new to shopping for software, Vendr has already done the heavy lifting, negotiating exclusive pricing with a multitude of partners, which means you can skip the tedious back-and-forth negotiations altogether.

Their website features a marketplace that allows easy navigation across various categories, including DevOps, IT Infrastructure, Sales, and more. The platform enhances the entire procurement process, turning it into a streamlined experience that users find both intuitive and efficient.

As for leadership, Aaron Epstein serves as their Group Partner, guiding Vendr through the evolving landscape of SaaS procurement. The company is tagged under key sectors such as SaaS, procurement, and Boston tech.

Overall, Vendr.com is the no-brainer solution for businesses aiming to purchase software smartly, ensuring that every department can buy what it needs at the best possible price. For more information, you can visit [Vendr.com](http://www.vendr.com).
